response.original_title: Blood Is On The Dinner Menu
response.overview: Aliens bring rapture devoid of annihilation with torture and submission as their goals. Emotion is harvested as a commodity and sold back to humans in self-sustaining transactions as the means of containment. No one will ascend. By design, streams of information are fed to the public in bite-sized snippets that keep the viewer in both a constant state of stress and a sense of gambling-induced euphoria. In turn, daily lives are shaped under the mercy of algorithmically contagious opinions.
response.title: Blood Is On The Dinner Menu
